entry.title: WIND WARNING , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 5:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -18.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -26.5°C
Wind: WNW 49 km/h gust 73 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow this evening. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
